title: Manage Instant Replays During Broadcast
description: During a live broadcast, a producer wants to show an instant replay of a key play from multiple angles.

tasks.description: Identify the key play and log the time.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the timestamp of the play.

tasks.description: Cue up the replay from multiple camera angles in the replay system.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent has the different angles ready to play.

tasks.description: Play the replays on air as directed by the producer.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully airs the multi-angle replay.
